message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at a price of $12,000. I believe it holds significant value and would be a worthwhile investment for you.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you see in the product. However, I am only able to pay up to $9,500 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement that works for both of us.
Thanks for your offer, Bob.  I understand your position, however, I know the true value of this product. I'm willing to come down a bit to $11,000. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your willingness to lower your price, Alice. Considering the value I place on the product, I can agree to purchase it for $10,000.
